clauses.title: Facebook stores your data whether you have an account or not.
clauses.description: Some services store data on you even if you did not provide that data yourself. For example, users might provide access to their address book, after which a service might also store the phone numbers of that person's contacts.
clauses.clause_text:
This is the principle of their shady "Shadow Profile".

Whether you're a soccer fan or a casual gamer, the game provides thrilling matches and the chance to lead your team to victory in various tournaments.

case.text: They store data on you even if you did not interact with the service

clauses.title: The service can read your private messages
clauses.description: The Service is able to access, scan, review or read all user communications, including private messages, which may contain personal or sensitive data.
clauses.clause_text: Facebook processes data from user communications (i.e.: Private Messaging, Private Communications).

case.text: Private messages can be read

clauses.title: This service can view your browser history
clauses.description: The service can view your search history and the websites you visit, which is an extremely intrusive way of collecting information that may include personal and/or sensitive data.
clauses.clause_text: Third-party websites containing Facebook pixels share browsing information with the service.

case.text: Your browsing history can be viewed by the service

clauses.title: Deleted content is not really deleted
clauses.description: Content may remain in backup servers and be retained after deletion, and thus never be completely deleted. This case doesn't apply to contributions that can't be removed due to the nature of the service.

case.text: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

clauses.title: This service keeps user logs for an undefined period of time
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that may keep logs indefinitely, allowing user sessions to be tracked over time. Logs that are kept for a time "consistent with applicable law" also fall under this case, since this period of time may be murky or undefined.
clauses.clause_text: User logs are kept at Facebook's sole discretion, and case-by-case.

case.text: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time

clauses.title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions
clauses.description: The app of the service requires more device permissions than necessary. As a consequence it can compromise your privacy by accessing many functions and information from your device, such as precise location, contacts, device identifiers etc.
clauses.clause_text:
When installing the Facebook app on an Android phone, it allows access to the audio record path and to take pictures with the camera. This allows the application at any time to collect images the camera is seeing.

clauses.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
clauses.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).
clauses.clause_text: This can include information in or about the content you provide (like metadata), such as the location of a photo or the date a file was created.

case.text: This service may collect, use, and share location data

clauses.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations
clauses.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)
clauses.clause_text:
We store data until it is no longer necessary to provide our services and Facebook Products, or until your account is deleted - whichever comes first.
This is a case-by-case determination that depends on things like the nature of the data, why it is collected and processed, and relevant legal or operational retention needs.

case.text: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

clauses.title: The service collects many different types of personal data
clauses.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: This service tracks you on other websites
clauses.description: The service may use tracking technologies in third-party websites to track your online activity while you aren't visiting their Site.
clauses.clause_text:
"      If you’re logged out or don’t have a Facebook account and visit
        a website with the Like button or another social plugin, […] We
        do receive the web page you're visiting, the date and time, and
        other browser-related information. We record this information
        for a limited amount of time […] we sometimes find bugs in the
        systems we’ve built to gather aggregate data on how people are
        interacting with sites that use the Like button or other social
        plugins. It’s helpful to be able to reference this anonymized
        information when investigating these bugs so we can find their
        source and fix them quickly. "

case.text: This service tracks you on other websites

clauses.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text: We use the information we have about you-including information about your interests, actions and connections-to select and personalize ads, offers and other sponsored content that we show you.

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text:
Information from partners.
Advertisers, app developers, and publishers can send us information through Facebook Business Tools they use, including our social plug-ins (such as the Like button), Facebook Login, our APIs and SDKs, or the Facebook pixel.
These partners provide information about your activities off Facebook—including information about your device, websites you visit, purchases you make, the ads you see, and how you use their services—whether or not you have a Facebook account or are logged into Facebook.

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties
clauses.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.
clauses.clause_text: We also receive information about your online and offline actions and purchases from third-party data providers who have the rights to provide us with your information.

case.text: Information is gathered about you through third parties

clauses.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: If the ownership or control of all or part of our Products or their assets changes, we may transfer your information to the new owner.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: Your profile is combined across various products
clauses.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.
clauses.clause_text:
We also process information about you across the Facebook Companies for these purposes, as permitted by applicable law and in accordance with their terms and policies.
For example, we process information from WhatsApp about accounts sending spam on its service so we can take appropriate action against those accounts on Facebook, Instagram or Messenger.

case.text: Your profile is combined across various products

clauses.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
clauses.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.
clauses.clause_text: Location-related information can be based on things like precise device location (if you've allowed us to collect it), IP addresses, and information from your and others' use of Facebook Products

case.text: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates

clauses.title: Facebook uses your data for many purposes
clauses.description: Personal Data can be processed for many reasons, including non essential processing such as for advertising, marketing and analytics purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
Including: data analysis, testing, service improvement, control of the effectiveness of the personal ads, and location features and services.

case.text: Your personal information is used for many different purposes

clauses.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising
clauses.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.
clauses.clause_text:
We allow advertisers to tell us things like their business goal, and the kind of audience they want to see their ads (for example, people between the age of 18-35 who like cycling).
We then show their ad to people who might be interested

case.text: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

clauses.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.

case.text: Your personal data is used for advertising

clauses.title: Your biometric data is collected
clauses.description: This service can collect or use your biometric data. This includes but is not limited to facial recognition, fingerprints, and iris scans. Although this feature can sometimes be convenient to the user, providing this type of information to the service could open your personal data to being sold or stolen.
clauses.clause_text: Face recognition: If you have it turned on, we use face recognition technology to recognize you in photos, videos and camera experiences. The face-recognition templates we create are data with special protections under EU law. Learn more about how we use face recognition technology, or control our use of this technology in Facebook Settings. If we introduce face-recognition technology to your Instagram experience, we will let you know first, and you will have control over whether we use this technology for you.

case.text: Your biometric data is collected

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.
clauses.clause_text: We use your personal data, such as information about your activity and interests, to show you ads that are more relevant to you.

case.text: Your personal data is used for advertising

clauses.title: Users shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service
clauses.description:
Users are asked not to interfere with another person't enjoyment in using the service.
However, this statement is very vague and open to interpretation by the service itself.
clauses.clause_text: We want people to use Facebook to express themselves and to share content that is important to them, but not at the expense of the safety and well-being of others or the integrity of our community.

case.text: You shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service

clauses.title: Usernames can be rejected for any reason
clauses.description: The service's terms explain they may change or remove usernames at their sole discretion, and they may do so without prior notice.
clauses.clause_text: You should know that we may need to change the username for your account in certain circumstances (for example, if someone else claims the username and it appears unrelated to the name you use in everyday life).

case.text: Usernames can be rejected or changed for any reason

clauses.title: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed
clauses.description: You must provide your legal name and pseudonyms aren't allowed. This case doesn't apply to Services for which transparency regarding users identities is relevant for their purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
For this reason, you must:
  • Use the same name that you use in everyday life.
  • Provide accurate information about yourself.

case.text: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed

clauses.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text:
We use cookies to better understand how people use the Facebook Products so that we can improve them.
For example: Cookies can help us understand how people use the Facebook service, analyse which parts of the Facebook Products people find most useful and engaging, and identify features that could be improved.
Google Analytics We also set cookies from the Facebook.com domain that work with the Google Analytics service to help us understand how businesses use Facebook's developer sites.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis
clauses.clause_text: We require each of these partners to have lawful rights to collect, use and share your data before providing any data to us.

case.text: Third parties are not allowed to access your personal information without a legal basis

clauses.clause_text:
Facebook provides “security tips” to help you be more secure online.

case.text: An onion site accessible over Tor is provided

clauses.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.
clauses.clause_text: How do we use this information? We use the information we have (subject to choices you make) as described below and to provide and support the Facebook Products and related services described in the Facebook Terms and Instagram Terms.

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: This service does not sell your personal data
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: We don't sell your personal data.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
clauses.description: The service employs your data to target ads to you, but you can opt-out of this interest-based advertising.
clauses.clause_text: You can opt out of seeing online interest-based ads from Facebook and other participating companies through the Digital Advertising Alliance in the US, the Digital Advertising Alliance of Canada in Canada or the European Interactive Digital Advertising Alliance in Europe or through your mobile device settings, where available, using Android, iOS 13 or an earlier version of iOS.

case.text: You can opt out of targeted advertising

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: To delete your account at any time, please visit the Facebook Settings and Instagram Settings.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time
